description: Arachnophilia is an arcade-style simulation of a night in the life of a spider. Your goal is to survive for as long as possible by building a web to trap and devour the hapless insects who blunder into it. How long can you survive, and how many different insects will you meet along the way? Can you become a legend among spiders and capture the bat? But it's not all about survival - along with helpful gameplay tips, you're also treated to an array of interesting facts about spiders and the other creatures you encounter. And for a more relaxed experience you can indulge in "Art Mode", where you have unlimited webbing and an undisturbed canvas.
